html:
11.21.18  6:11 pm   is "slow down" from the mt. st. helens video?

     no

11.21.18  4:58 pm   when will we discover time travel?

     now

11.21.18  3:29 pm   when did you stop making sense

     i stop each day and then start again

11.21.18  3:04 pm   There are some people who say that some of the stuff in you history videos is all wrong. Well, I disagree, and I think it's a very fun way to learn about the history of the world and Japan. Do you agree?

     some people say your question is lousy and not good. but i disagree, i think it's good. what do you think

11.21.18  2:52 pm   Your songs sound amazing in my car. Today I was wondering, do you start by recording your voice first before instruments? It's like if the instruments were made to accompany your voice. Thanks!

     i put just enough instruments to have a comfortable time singing, then i re-do the instruments after

11.21.18  2:06 pm   are you planning on adding something to your website soon

     no but i would like to

11.21.18  1:53 pm   do you like doing something

     yes

11.21.18  1:14 pm   When will you get older?

     any minute now

11.21.18  12:44 pm   Are the notes at the beginning of Slow Down sixteenth notes at a faster tempo or is there some sort of weird polyrhythm going on in the same tempo as the rest of the song?

     it must be a different tempo. there is no relation

11.21.18  12:35 pm   how do I bobble?

     naturally

11.21.18  11:42 am   who is that weird triange figure jumping on the ruler?

     could be you

11.21.18  9:42 am   why is your music so sad but so happy

     to hopefully be some kind of microcosm of the known universe

11.21.18  9:27 am   what do you think the purpose of a solo is in a song?

     take a break from lyrics

     Sometimes solos can feel like an obligation. 

     if u don't need a break, don't take one, that's what i say

11.21.18  7:09 am   Are your musics meant to be happy, sad, relaxing, or make people be on a certain mood?

     sure

11.21.18  6:43 am   Do you like making ur videos?

     yes and no, but yes

11.21.18  6:27 am   YeEt what is your fav show right now and what are you hyped for when it comes back after season brake

     the one i'm making, and there's no breaks and therefore no time to watch any others

11.21.18  3:19 am   Been watching your reality page for a few days, and lemme get this straight - your old creative process (or at least, your creative process circa 2012) - improv, record your improv, listen back to it for anything you like, and anything you dig, go back to it later and build that improv into a full track?

     not really. i have gotten song ideas from improvs but i don't think any of them have been put to use yet

11.21.18  12:43 am   What's the best meal for one?

     leafs

11.21.18  12:41 am   If u put milk in a bowl of cereal does it become a sauce, broth, or beverage?

     cereal

11.20.18  11:55 pm   What's your method of creating videos for some of your songs?

      freak out that it can't be done until i black out and it's done

11.20.18  11:09 pm   Do you like umbrellas?

     they're ok

11.20.18  10:27 pm   quick! tell me a bedtime story

     once upon a time there was a bed

11.20.18  10:26 pm   I saw an answer to a question about the 9/4 time in I Wanna Be a Movie Star where you said it was to symbolize being so close but having to wait to become successful. Did you write it this way purposely, or did you just make up that explanation after writing the song?

     both

11.20.18  10:20 pm   Why would you open a hotel in the tundra?

     very lucrative. no competition. also save money on air conditioning

11.20.18  10:14 pm   do you enjoy when people theorize about your content?

     sure

11.20.18  10:14 pm   Do you actually play the high E in the keyboard solo in La De Da De Da De Da De Day Oh or do you play the D and use the pitch blend? If so, what other notes during the solo do you use it, I'm trying to learn it as accurately as possible.

     that is a bend up from D

11.20.18  9:27 pm   I have a guitar riff recorded as a voice memo on my phone, and a drum beat recorded on my phone, what is a way that I can combine them?

     import them into a multi track recording program and map the beats, or just re record one of them to match. or re record both to match the click

11.20.18  8:54 pm   how do you do music?

     i have no idea

11.20.18  8:04 pm   what is your favorite web series and why?

     the weather

11.20.18  7:29 pm   has the serious increase in following changed your creative process at all? 

     no

11.20.18  7:15 pm   will you ever put ur bach interpretations on the website? i know you have a busy schedule but i feel like they should be free like all ur other musics

     i have never done interpretations but one time as a practice activity i did it soullessly verbatim, mostly as a reading / programming exercise

11.20.18  6:40 pm   How am I alive

     i'm not sure

11.20.18  5:15 pm   the more i learn, the higher my expectations get. where do i go from here?

     higher

11.20.18  4:30 pm   Can you explain the concept of the loudness war to me? Aren't you supposed to mix songs as loud as possible as long as it's not distorting?

     yes. the challenge is to make sure it's not quieter than everyone else, and still not have it sound strange. so over time, everyone starts to get better at sneaking everything up tighter against the ceiling and finding new tricks to keep it sounding ok while sounding louder

11.20.18  4:26 pm   What is the optimal texture for a set of curtains?

     gooey

11.20.18  4:25 pm   What is a pocketbook for?

     to carry your pocketbook in

11.20.18  4:21 pm   When did you make your first music video?

     2010 maybe

      And why did you make it?

     as practice for the next one

11.20.18  3:50 pm   How long are you planning on keeping the 2 week schedule?

     at least a year

      Do you have a set date for when you'll be doing something else or are you just going to keep doing it until you can't?

     i might switch in some other formats but keep the same release schedule

11.20.18  2:57 pm   hey bill, i got in a good rut on a project, finished it 80% and then accidentally got stuck in bad rut. how do i switch ruts? what if the old one is gone?

     you'll have to jump

11.20.18  2:29 pm   why is slef

     could be fun

11.20.18  2:02 pm   What was something you didn't like in the past, but you like now or vice versa?

     different shapes

11.20.18  1:59 pm   what is your favorite abbreviation?

     u

11.20.18  1:35 pm   bill is ukelele invalid to you

     no, i use it in many many videos. it's even in the thumbnail picture for one of them

11.20.18  1:22 pm   do you have a particular theme in mind when you begin the song writing process?

     sometimes

     or do you kind of let it go with the flow?

     yes

11.20.18  12:58 pm   Do you consider yourself the original surreal meme?

     i think it was the big bang

11.20.18  12:52 pm   sometimes I feel lonely for no reason, I think I am broken but I lost my warranty. What should I do?

     dabble in invention, and inventiveness

11.20.18  12:48 pm   have you ever considered buying a keytar?

     no

11.20.18  11:43 am   your music makes me smile and dance around. What does it make you do?

     create it into a tangible medium

11.20.18  11:39 am   Do you find some of these questions difficult to awnser?

     yes

11.20.18  10:41 am   Why do you make your videos?

     could be fun

      Do you like the process of it?

     yes and no, also yes

      The final product?

     i try to make it as good as i can

      What people think of them?

     some people like them and some people hate them. and some people think they are ok

      Is there some deep meaning behind all this we are missing?

Help me, Bill

     if you clarify which meaning you are seeing then maybe i could determine which meaning you are missing, by process of elimination
